name: Differens
description: Differens Marketing & Innovation was founded in 2008 by two partners to provide advanced integrated services in marketing, digital marketing, and online communication. The team includes creatives, web designers, UX/UI designers, developers, SEO specialists, web marketing specialists, communication technicians, and video production.

locations.name: Ancona HQ
locations.address: Via Caduti del Lavoro, 4, 60131 Ancona, Italy

core_services: Digital Strategy: online strategy design, social media marketing, search engine optimization, data analytics
Growth Marketing: digital marketing for fast customer growth, programmatic advertising, marketing automation, conversion rate optimization
Demand Generation: lead & demand generation campaigns, inbound marketing, pay per click advertising
Web/Mobile Apps and Media: UX/UI design, web and app development, mobile development, video storytelling
